subject: Re: [junit] Junit.jar source code
msgSnippet: Sayali, The JUnit source ships with Eclipse.  Right-click the jar in your project, choose Properties, and then Java Source Location.  In my Eclipse, the
messageBody:
Sayali,

The JUnit source ships with Eclipse. Right-click the jar in your
project, choose Properties, and then Java Source Location. In my
Eclipse, the expression JUNIT_SRC_HOME/junitsrc.zip will attach the
correct source. Let us know if that fixes things. Good luck,

David Saff

sayali_mani wrote:

> Sayali
